name: MIDInight Run
description:
A finite runner that generates levels from the note/instrument sequence of any *.mid file. Also, it will play the midi file. - A failed experiment made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41 Tools: Unity, Sublime Text Font "Barlow" by Jeremy Tribby "unity-midi" by Nobuki Yoda 
https://github.com/n-yoda/unity-midi Included soundfont and midi files made by many different people.

-

Warning: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. I really don't know.
